```{r}
source("R/main.r")
```

```{r echo = FALSE}
int <- readRDS("./output/rdata/2021_November_05_17:22_gse_control_integrated.RData")
```

```{r}
p <- DimPlot(int, reduction = "umap", group.by = "orig.ident")
p
ggsave(file=file.path("output", "results", 
                  paste("grouped_unassigned", ".png", sep="")), plot=p, width=15, height=18, dpi=600)
```

```{r}
p <- DimPlot(int, reduction = "umap", label = TRUE)
p
ggsave(file=file.path("output", "results", 
                  paste("cell-types_unassigned", ".png", sep="")), plot=p, width=15, height=18, dpi=600)
```

```{r}
p = FeaturePlot(object = int, 
            features = c("ADAMDEC1"),
            cols = c("grey", "blue"),
            reduction  = "umap")
p
ggsave(file=file.path("output", "results", 
                  paste("ADAMDEC1_unassigned", ".png", sep="")), plot=p, width=15, height=18, dpi=600)
```
